body.name: Homedics TotalClean 5-in-1 Tower Air Purifier UV-C Technology, Bacteria, Virus, Allergens, UV-C Light for Bedrooms, Offices, 3-in-1 HEPA-Type Filtration, Activated Carbon Odor Filter for Medium Rooms
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 17 hrs 18 mins
features: Breathe Easier: 3-in-1 HEPA-type filtration; removes up to 99% of airborne allergens as small as 0.3 microns; built-in carbon odor filter reduces odors and VOCs; prefilter captures large particles
Total Clean: UV-C technology reduces bacteria, mold, fungus, and virus; ionizer enhances purification
Medium-Sized Room: Ideal for bedrooms and home offices up to 106 sq. ft.; changes air in a 106 sq. ft. room every 12.5 minutes
Versatile: Low, medium, and high-speed settings; essential oil pads for optional aromatherapy infusion; optional night-light
What’s in the Box: (1) Homedics TotalClean 5-in-1 Tower Air Purifier with UV-C Technology, (1) HEPA-Type Filter with Built-in Prefilter and Carbon Odor Filter, (3) Essential Oil Tray Pads
body.description: Enjoy a breath of fresh air at home. Designed for rooms up to 106 sq. ft.***, this powerful, compact air purifier features state-of-the-art HEPA-type filtration, a carbon filter, and UV-C technology to reduce bacteria and virus**, household odors, and VOCs††. A robust prefilter and ionizer further purify your air. Optional aromatherapy delivers a soothing, essential oil-infused aroma. A soft, glowing nightlight adds a touch of comfort to children’s bedrooms. DISCLAIMERS *From air that passes through the filter **Reduces E. coli bacteria, Phi-X174 virus, A. niger mold, and P. citrinum fungus in the air with UV-C on. Shown by independent third-party testing. ***Based on AHAM AC-1 test results. †Air changes per hour are based on the smoke CADR value x 60 minutes divided by the suggested room size volume assuming an 8 ft. ceiling ††Per third-party testing
